plot: A tactless, motor-mouthed weakling will betray anyone to save his own skin in this dark, violent comedy.
title: Piano Man
plot_es: A tactless, motor-mouthed weakling will betray anyone to save his own skin in this dark, violent comedy.
plot_en: A tactless, motor-mouthed weakling will betray anyone to save his own skin in this dark, violent comedy.
